annotations.description: Real world versions of drinks from Skyrim, as served by Talen-Jei at the Bee and the Barb in Riften! I used to be an adventurer, like you, but then I took an...
annotations.title: Drinks from Skyrim | How to Drink

textContent:
5 blackberries
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. honey syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Amaro Di Angostura
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Antica Formula Vermouth (typo in video makes this 2 oz. don't do that)
1 egg white

Muddle blackberries and syrup. 
Dry Shake, Shake & Strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAKSf6IznTc
title: Velvet LeChance
